DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label , crossover , pharmacokinetic , bioavailability study involve adolescent adult refractory ( drug-resistant ) epilepsy
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Bioavailability , Safety Tolerability Diazepam Nasal Spray Versus Diazepam Rectal Gel ( Diastat® )
DOC.detailed_description: To determine bioavailability diazepam nasal spray versus diazepam rectal gel ( Diastat® ) condition use adolescent adult person epilepsy ( PWE ) meeting definition refractory epilepsy .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis refractory epilepsy Body weight 26 111 kilogram ( kg ) inclusive Other inclusion criterion apply Male female subject surgically sterile female subject le 2 year postmenopausal , agree use highly effective birth control method study 3 month last dose investigational product Female subject pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant Presence history abnormality illness may affect absorption , distribution , metabolism elimination diazepam Other exclusion criterion apply
